invocations.description: Returns all the information the bot has has about the item with id itemid. This value is the same as in the file '/tibiadata/items.xml'.
invocations.exDescription: Will print in the console whether 'gold coins' are enchantable or not.

invocations.description: Returns all the information the bot has has about the item named itemname. This value is the same as in the file '/tibiadata/items.xml'.
invocations.exDescription: Will print in the console the maximum range you can do with a 'wand of inferno', based on the database value.
